++ Mokoi Gaming

http://sourceforge.net/projects/mokoi


Description

Mokoi Gaming is a Game Creation Tool. Mokoi Games are platform neutral, if a compatible player is available for OS or Device, you can play games with no troubles. We're also have projects to help with creating and sharing platform neutral games.

Features

Creates platform neutral games.
Easy to use Game Editor.
Content Sharing and Basic Game Frameworks.
Multiple Audio/Text Languages Support for Games.
Multiple Display Layers with Independent Movement.
